column5: There are various therapies that can help improve mental health. Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT) focuses on changing negative thought patterns. Dialectical Behavior Therapy (DBT) helps manage emotions. Explore therapies like talk therapy#Comma art therapy#Comma or mindfulness-based therapies for a holistic approach to healing.

Medications can be prescribed to manage mental health conditions. Consult a psychiatrist to discuss whether medication is appropriate for you. Medication combined with therapy can be a powerful approach to finding relief from symptoms.
